name: Minesweeper Tapa
description:
This is Minesweeper, but the clues are like Tapa puzzles. That is, of the 8 neighbouring cells, clues will indicate the sizes of independent mine groups. A '2' clue means there are two connected mines next to this cell, where as a '1, 1' clue means there are two unconnected mines. These clues are more information rich, so the number of mines is quite high.

I made this over the course of a week to begin learning Godot Engine. It's not really the right approach to make this as a web game, but it was a fun project all the same.
